casebody.data:
CITIFINANCIAL SERVICING, LLC, a Delaware Limited Liability Company, 300 St. Paul Place, Baltimore, MD 21202, Respondent
v.
Tracey A. WILSON, Darrell A. Arbore, a/k/a Darrell Arbore, 690 Adele Drive, North Huntingdon, PA 15642, Petitioners No. 451 WAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. April 3, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 3rd day of April, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
